title: Task Management API
description: A RESTful backend API for managing projects and tasks with authentication, relational data models, and clean API design principles.

title: Smart Takeaway Ordering System
description: A backend-focused pre-order system that enables users to place takeaway orders in advance and collect them via scheduled pickup slots, focusing on order lifecycle management and efficient queue handling.

title: Smart Complaint & Resolution System
description: A backend-driven system to register, track, and resolve complaints using role-based access control, priority handling, and structured status workflows.

title: Burger Ordering System
description: A Node.js-based backend application implementing full CRUD operations with a modular architecture for maintainability.
